item.title: Path/Way doesn't match map problem, 26th July
item.description:
Definitive alignment crosses in & out of obstructed fenced woodland on several occasions. Established trodden route in field to E side of fence / hedge line confirmed by existing waymarkers (photo 6).
Report on FixMyStreet
